reviewText: These videos are phenomenal! They really helped my husband relax and free his tension. If you watch and follow all 12 videos you are bound to get effects. Dr. Borbn has a great way of explaining exactly what you should do step by step. He clearly demonstrates the procedure and you can feel your body draining the stress as you follow along. I would recommend this tool kit to anyone who is tense and needs to loosen up a bit!

This video is fantastic.
For years, I have been trying to find an effective way to calm down.
Dr. Borbn's instructions are easy to follow.
This is perfect for anyone who has ever said they feel stressed or overwhelmed.
Especially if you have ever said you don't have time to take care of yourself.
